tool.name: Scater Filter QC metrics
tool.description: Filter based on QC metrics from serialized scater R object
tool.command:
ln -s '$R_scater_qc' R_scater_qc.rds;
scater-filter.R -i '$R_scater_qc' #if $subset_cell_variables: -s '$subset_cell_variables' #end if #if $low_cell_thresholds: -l '$low_cell_thresholds' #end if #if $n_cells_counts: -t '$n_cells_counts' #end if #if $min_feature_n_cells_counts: -m '$min_feature_n_cells_counts' #end if -o '$R_scater_filtered' #if $cell_filter_matrix: -u '$cell_filter_matrix' #end if #if $feature_filter_matrix: -v '$feature_filter_matrix' #end if

param.name: R_scater_qc
param.help: A serialized SingleCellExperiment object file in RDS format.

param.name: subset_cell_variables
param.help: Comma-separated parameters to subset on. Any variable available in the colData of the supplied object.

param.name: low_cell_thresholds
param.help: Comma-separated low cutoffs for the parameters (default is -Inf).

param.name: n_cells_counts
param.help: Comma-separated parameters to subset on. Any variable available in the colData of the supplied object.

param.name: min_feature_n_cells_counts
param.help: Comma-separated low cutoffs for the parameters (default is -Inf).

data.name: R_scater_filtered
data.help: File name in which to store serialized R object of type Seurat

data.name: cell_filter_matrix
data.help: File name in which to store a matrix showing results of applying individual cell selection criteria.

data.name: feature_filter_matrix
data.help: File name in which to store a matrix showing results of applying individual feature selection criteria.

tool.help:
Usage: scater-filter.R [options]
Options: -i INPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --input-object-file=INPUT-OBJECT-FILE
-s SUBSET-CELL-VARIABLES, --subset-cell-variables=SUBSET-CELL-VARIABLES
-l LOW-CELL-THRESHOLDS, --low-cell-thresholds=LOW-CELL-THRESHOLDS
-j HIGH-CELL-THRESHOLDS, --high-cell-thresholds=HIGH-CELL-THRESHOLDS
-c CELLS-USE, --cells-use=CELLS-USE Comma-separated list of cell names to use as a subset. Alternatively, text file with one cell per line providing cell names to use as a subset.
-t SUBSET-FEATURE-VARIABLES, --subset-feature-variables=SUBSET-FEATURE-VARIABLES
-m LOW-FEATURE-THRESHOLDS, --low-feature-thresholds=LOW-FEATURE-THRESHOLDS
-n HIGH-FEATURE-THRESHOLDS, --high-feature-thresholds=HIGH-FEATURE-THRESHOLDS Comma-separated high cutoffs for the parameters (default is Inf).
-f FEATURES--USE, --features--use=FEATURES--USE Comma-separated list of cell names to use as a subset. Alternatively, text file with one cell per line providing cell names to use as a subset.
-o OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE, --output-object-file=OUTPUT-OBJECT-FILE
-u OUTPUT-CELLSELECT-FILE, --output-cellselect-file=OUTPUT-CELLSELECT-FILE
-v OUTPUT-FEATURESELECT-FILE, --output-featureselect-file=OUTPUT-FEATURESELECT-FILE
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
